name: Labyrinth Deck
description:
"Dalia finds herself in an dreamlike labyrinth from which she must escape if she wants to wake up. To escape from the labyrinth and its guardians, she must choose -from sets of 3 cards- a card that will guide her through the maze and find her way out"

Made for the A Game By Its Cover 2021 Game Jam, based on the super cute cartridge designed by Nat Morillo for the Famicase Exhibition.

Nat is one of my best friends and one of the cutest persons I've ever  met, so I definitely had to do this game <3 This has been such an interesting project to me as it's been a long time since I did a solo project like this. I've wanted to switch to FOSS software to create my games for a while, so I took this opportunity to learn how to use Godot. And it's been also my first time doing a 3D game by myself, so I'm sorry if everything looks a bit shabby :S Anyways, it's been so much fun and I hope you enjoy it <3

**The game is not complete yet, e.g. you'll see there's no music or sounds. I'll update it in the upcoming days with more levels to play and stuff :3 I'll also add Windows and Linux versions and a link to the public repository so everyone can check the project.
